credentialSubject.rule:
ai_systems_containing_data(DataId, AISystemName) :-
    % Find the datapack containing the specific data item
    db:get_taibom_data(_, _, DataId, _, _, _, _),
    db:get_taibom_datapack(Datasets, DatapackId, _),
    member(dataset(_, DataId), Datasets),
    % Find the AI system linked to the datapack
    get_ai_system(_, data(_, DatapackId), _, AISystemName).
